summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beautify Professional Large Lockable Acrylic Vanity Makeup & Cosmetic Storage Display Case with Frame (Rose Gold)
Review Date: 2017/11/13
Store: Beautify
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '11.8 x 6.3 x 7.5 inches; 2.8 Pounds'}
Review Text: I love this case it is so beautiful and I can fit everything but my eyeshadow pallets in it. I should note the bottom portion is large enough. I just prefer to put my brushes and sponges in it. I wish the black compartments were just a bit wider. Despite me loving this so much, I wouldn’t purchase this again. It’s too expensive. The arcrylic is thin, the metal is cheap, handle is plastic, and it’s difficult to get things to aglin. I fear this won’t hold up for more than a year or two.
Review Title: I love it, but poor quality
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LORMAY Silicone Makeup Brush Set(7pcs, Mint Green)
Review Date: 2018/11/15
Store: LORMAY
Product Description: ['Set contains:', '7 pieces of silicone makeup brushes', 'Product Highlights:', '1. Silicone brushes have become popular in the last five years. Unlike hair brushes, silicone brushes are easy to clean, easy to dry. They can be used repeatedly and have a long service life. 2. Silicone brushes can significantly reduce the consumption of makeup. We know that hair brushes easily soak up expensive beauty products. This is a waste.However, silicone brushes can minimize waste, as they do not soak up any fluids. 3. Silicone brushes are perfect for applying face masks, gels, creams, or liquid-like beauty products. 4. Silicone brushes are portable and easy to use, whether you are on the go, at home, or in the office. 5. 5. The big brush is used to apply facial mask and foundation makeup. The small brushes are used for the eye shadow, eyeliner, eyebrow, and lip makeup. 6. Silicone material is nontoxic and odorless, which meets FDA standards for quality, safety, and efficacy.', 'Tips:', '1. Clean these brushes with a small amount of soap or makeup remover and rinse them under lukewarm water. 2. Keep away from sharp objects like tweezers or brow scissors.', 'About LORMAY:', 'LORMAY is a professional beauty & personal care product supplier, focusing on supplying all kinds of high-quality, stylish and attractive makeup brushes and cosmetics. We devote ourselves to improving customers online shopping experience. Absolutely100% MONEY BACK guarantee if you are not satisfied.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LORMAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '7', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.9 x 3.9 x 0.5 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.11 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.9 x 3.9 x 0.5 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '724190551905'}
Review Text: This aren’t the greatest thing in the world, but that is just the nature of silicone brushes. However, this is an excellent value and totally worth purchasing. I use the larger ones to mix gels and lotions together. I tried using them to apply lotion and clay masks but I get better coverage with my fingers and I don’t have to worry about cleaning anything off. The other ones work fine for makeup application, I just prefer traditional brushes. I can being of use with cream, gel, or getting the last of a product out. Also, for the price these are really good quality.
Review Title: Nice product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Makeup Brushes 12PCs- CLOWII Professional Premium Birch Handle Makeup Brush Foundation Concealer Brush Set of 12 with 1 Makeup Cleaner(Black)
Review Date: 2021/07/05
Store: CLOWII
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CLOWII', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Concealing, For Foundation', 'Material': 'Silicone, Wool', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '12', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Handle Material': 'Silicone', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 4.41 x 1.69 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '741818684043'}
Review Text: I love the quality of these brushes. I get excellent results with them and the are so comfortable to use. The only thing I don’t like is the silver name stamped into the handles- really ruins the whole look. That’s such a trivia reason but I’m not sure I would have bought these if I saw that.
Review Title: Love them
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (1# Light Brown)
Review Date: 2021/07/25
Store: EINHOOM
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really like this a lot. It gives my eyebrows a very natural full look. However it is very flawed. The tip dries out quickly and it takes a long time to get it full and wet again. It seriously takes 20 minutes to do my brows with this. I wish it wasn’t like that because it’s perfect in every other way - stays in place, easy to remove…
Review Title: Great when it works
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KISSIO 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Waterproof,Thrive Mascara,Voluptuous Volume,Intense Length,Long Lasting,No Smudging,No Clumping,Cruelty Free,Black
Review Date: 2021/10/10
Store: KISSIO
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5.08 x 1.14 x 1.1 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
Review Text: I freaking love this. It produced long voluminous lashes that look 100 percent natural. It is completely waterproof and stays in place all day - even with my oily skin. It takes very little effort to remove it - just a bit extra cleanser. I’m very upset that this is sold out because I was about to buy 3. I seriously love this.
Review Title: Holy Grail
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MAEPEOR Matte Powder Waterproof and Long Lasting Pressed Powder with Full Coverage and Smooths Skin for All Skin Tone (Light 01, 0.4oz)
Review Date: 2021/10/10
Store: MAEPEOR
Average Rating: 2.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MAEPEOR', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,All Skin Types', 'Coverage': 'Lightweight,Buildable Coverage,Full', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.39 x 0.2 inches; 2.33 Ounces'}
Review Text: There is very little coverage to this product. It does help with shine but there are many products that are better. I use this to set my lipstick. The compact and sponge is nice. It’s too bad this couldn’t perform better.
Review Title: Little Coverage
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BeautyGARDE MAGIC Charcoal Facial Cleanser - detoxifying and anti-pollution face cleanser, Nonie Creme
Review Date: 2021/10/13
Store: BeautyGARDE
Average Rating: 2.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 2.13 x 7.75 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1201', 'UPC': '856365007242'}
Review Text: This product felt thick and oily on my skin. I definitely feel after and I had to stop using it. The silicone scrubber is also pretty useless.
Review Title: Oily
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

        Format your response exactly as follows:
        POSITIVE SUMMARY:
        [Your positive summary here]

        NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
        [Your negative summary here]

        OVERALL SUMMARY:
        [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed satisfaction with several products, highlighting their aesthetic appeal and functionality. They particularly enjoyed the organization capabilities and beauty of one makeup storage case, appreciating its spaciousness despite minor sizing preferences for compartments. The silicone makeup brushes were deemed a great value for money, with a comfortable usability for mixing and applying products, even if traditional brushes were favored. Furthermore, the user highly praised a mascara for its ability to create voluminous, natural-looking lashes without smudging, calling it their "Holy Grail." Overall, the user values good quality, aesthetic design, and functionality in their beauty purchases.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
On the downside, the user experienced quality concerns with multiple items. They noted that the vanity case felt overpriced and was made of thin acrylic and low-quality metal components. Additionally, some makeup tools did not meet expectations in terms of performance, particularly the eyebrow pen, which was frustratingly slow to apply due to a quickly drying tip. There were also disappointments regarding the coverage of a pressed powder and a facial cleanser that left an oily sensation on the skin. Overall, it seems the user often faced issues with product quality and effectiveness.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping behavior reflects a mix of positive and negative experiences. They appreciate aesthetic beauty and functionality but have encountered significant quality concerns with some purchases. While they found several items—such as storage cases, certain makeup brushes, and a terrific mascara—worthy of praise, there were consistent grievances regarding the durability and performance of other tools, leading to dissatisfaction. This hybrid experience indicates a desire for higher quality in beauty products that align with their expectations for functionality and value.

target_interaction.title: Really Cool
target_interaction.text: This is such a cool product. I love it. The color and longevity are perfect. It’s really flattering and it last nearly all day. There is a bit of a learning curve but once get used to its easy to use. It comes out fast which is the difficult part. I love the packaging too - really cute.
target_interaction.title_meta: QrBxa 20 Pcs/Set Tattoo Lipstick Cotton Swab Lipstick, Lip Tattoo Lip Stain Lipstick Cotton Swab, Waterproof Long-Lasting Non-Stick Lipstick Cotton Swab Lip Tint, Easy to Carry(Reddish Brown)
